articles.content: Telecom firm Bharti Airtel Ltd reported stellar earnings for the September quarter. The firm exceeded analysts estimates on key parameters aided by a one-time spectrum sale gain and tariff hikes unde… [+1687 chars]

articles.author: DHNS
articles.title: An even brighter Diwali: Karnataka slashes tax on petrol, diesel by Rs 7: Check prices - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Karnataka on Wednesday became the third BJP-ruled state to cut petrol and diesel prices by Rs 7. With this, petrol is expected to cost Rs 95.50 a litre and diesel Rs 81.50. The reduced prices will come into effect from Thursday evening.
articles.content:
Karnataka on Wednesday became the third BJP-ruled state to cut taxes on petrol and diesel by Rs 7.

articles.title: NHAI raises over Rs 5,000 cr through InvIT: Nitin Gadkari - Economic Times
articles.description: Two international pension funds, Canada Pension Plan Investment Board and Ontario Teachers Pension Plan Board, as anchor investors, will hold 25% of the units each in the recently launched NHAI InvIT.
